Description: Mould-made pottery `Frog Type' lamp decorated on top with a head of Attis. On the undefined base is an impressed point and crescent; the underside of the nozzle is defined by two short impressed strokes.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2127)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine (trustees)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Sir Henry Solomon Wellcome
